str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of pro and phemi; a foreteller; by analogy, an inspired speaker; by extension, a poet.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Samuel, a Hebrew prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Samuel, an Israelite.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To declare openly, proclaim, preach, laud, celebrate. From kata and the base of aggelos; to proclaim, promulgate.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
